summary:
hello! 
Im selling (or even gifting) this books that brought us all so much joy! I’m moving and since I have two copies I have...
body:
hello!

Im selling (or even gifting) this books that brought us all so much joy! I’m moving and since I have two copies I have to get rid of one bc i have to pack light.

DM telling me how much you would give for this. Minimum is shipping cost which would vary depending on where you live. Lmk!!!!

blog.name: wutisthislifehelp
blog.title: Am I More Than You Bargained For Yet?
blog.description: The literal embodiment of Ace. She/her but I don't really care. Everything Dark and Depressing. Throw a little TB Saga in there. Book worm. Memes. Music addict. Very uncool. Literal nerd, but could take you down if challenged to. Coffee. My friend accurately describes me a black rainbow. Stop by to say hello!

blog.description: This blog is dedicated to remembering & archiving all of Dan & Phil's historic events. From old tweets & videos to iconic livestreams, reminisce it all on the daily here! Disclaimer: I own none of the gifs, all credit goes to their respective owners!

summary: This Day in Dan & Phil History - June 3
title: This Day in Dan & Phil History - June 3
body:
2013 - aproductivephil

2014 - a clumsy and productive phil

2015 - aclumsyphil

2016 - TATINOF comes to St Louis, MO!

(via @phandr0meda)

2017 - dan puts the succ in succulents ;)

2018 - the howlters get a DREAM TEEN BEDROOM MAKEOVER

(also can we discuss dans jacket bc damn boi)
